S

setColour(int, Color) - Method in class slickshader.MultiTex
Sets the colour of a given corner.
Note that this will have an effect only if: the fixed pixel pipeline is being used; or the applied shader takes the vertex colour into account.
setColour(Color) - Method in class slickshader.MultiTex
Sets the colour of all four corners.
setLoggingDetail(int) - Static method in class slickshader.Shader
Sets the number of characters to be returned when printing errors.
Suggested values are the constants BRIEF, MODERATE, and VERBOSE.
setUniformColor(String, Color) - Method in class slickshader.Shader

Shader - Class in slickshader
Class used to use and access shaders without having to deal with all of the fidly openGL bits.
